name: d3.compose
description: Compose complex, data-driven visualizations from reusable charts and components with d3

scripts.test: tape test/**/*-test.js | faucet && eslint src test d3.compose.js d3.compose-mixins.js d3.compose-all.js
scripts.build: rimraf build && npm run build:core & npm run build:mixins & npm run build:all & gulp build:dist:css
scripts.uglify:core: cd build && uglifyjs d3.compose.js --source-map d3.compose.min.js.map --comments -c -m -o d3.compose.min.js
scripts.uglify:mixins: cd build && uglifyjs d3.compose-mixins.js --source-map d3.compose-mixins.min.js.map --comments -c -m -o d3.compose-mixins.min.js
scripts.uglify:all: cd build && uglifyjs d3.compose-all.js --source-map d3.compose-all.min.js.map --comments -c -m -o d3.compose-all.min.js
scripts.uglify: npm run uglify:core & npm run uglify:mixins & npm run uglify:all
scripts.version: npm run build && npm run uglify && gulp version:bower && git add -A

author: Tim Hall <timhall@cornerstonenw.com> (https://github.com/timhall)
